summary:
### Summary of ASX Announcement (Appendix 3C - Buy-back Notification):  

- **Type of Buy-back**: On-market buy-back  
- **Total Shares Bought Back to Date**: 3,426,591  
- **Shares Bought Back on 2/7/2025**: 16,006  
- **Remaining Buy-back Capacity**: 4,004,934 shares (out of max 7,447,531)  
- **Highest Price Paid (Previous Day)**: AUD 1.10  
- **Buy-back Period**: 19/11/2024 to 18/11/2025  
- **Broker Handling Buy-back**: Taylor Collison Limited  

*(No material operational/financial impacts beyond routine buy-back execution.)*
